item.title: Fly tipping blocked my whole door for entry, 5th October
item.description:
Hi people from next door flat they keep dumping their rubbish in the alleyway next to our house and blocked the whole door way our main entrance. I caught them once and warned him to remove which he did but right next day they piled the whole ally way with their unwanted rubbish. It's been a week now. Can we please take some action. Kids goes to school through this alleyway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Sandy Hill Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown pavement, 5th October
item.description:
The pavement is already very narrow. The overgrown ivy forces pedestrians even closer to the fast traffic at a place where there is no protection from parked vehicles. Many children and young people use this route on the way to and from schools and Sunray Gardens. I am worried there could be an accident with someone falling into the road. It is similar on the other side of the road by the P4/42 bus stop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Red Post Hill, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of Rubbish/litter, 5th October
item.description:
Lots of dropped litter accumulates in this area. This is an ongoing issue and the area needs more frequent routine street cleansing. I could have included lots more pictures.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders dumping on the street, 5th October
item.description:
The builders have been using the front garden and the street as a giant tip for their waste. Inviting some fly tipping to the area and creating a fire hazard as well as blocking the street. Any items or bins left on the road for weeks need to be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roding Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Tree, with dangerous branch about to fall, 5th October
item.description:
This is the third tree branch falling and causing a danger this year. Alongside this the tree is causing lifting pavement across the road all around the tree. This tree needs to be tended to. There once again is also pines all around that aren't being cleaned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Perth Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
